Title: Provides an authorized police officer or peace officer the ability to request ambulance service
Summary: Provides an authorized police officer or peace officer the ability to request ambulance service for certain individuals who need emergency admission for immediate observation, care and treatment.
LawCode: Amd ยง9.45, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing an authorized police officer or peace officer the ability to request ambulance service
